long_description: Keep your Garmin GPS (not included) in reach while on the move with the Garmin Colorado/Oregon carabiner clip. Your GPS unit fits securely into a mount that clips it to your belt. Simply thread the locking mechanism to the back of your GPS, and then snap your unit to the handy carrier. Push-button release disengages your GPS for quick, unfettered access when you're navigating or geocaching. Carabiner-style clip attaches to any pack strap or belt loop. This carabiner clip is only compatible with Garmin Colorado and Oregon series GPS units. Closeout.
short_description: Keep your Garmin GPS (not included) in reach while on the move with the Garmin Colorado/Oregon carabiner clip. Your GPS unit fits securely into a mount that clips it to your belt.
